dcterms:description: A dataset from a large-scale survey on energy transition conducted in Súdwest-Fryslân, involving 1,376 participants who provided choices and motivations regarding future energy policy.
dcterms:title: Participatory Value Evaluation (PVE)

dcterms:creator: S. L. Spruit
N. Mouter
dcterms:description: A value-annotated survey dataset focusing on the future energy policy of the municipality of Súdwest-Fryslân, capturing residents' preferences and motivations.
dcterms:title: Value-annotated survey on energy transition

dcterms:description: A collection of 35,000 tweets annotated for moral sentiment, providing insights into moral foundations as expressed in social media.
dcterms:title: Moral Foundations Twitter Corpus

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for training dialogue systems that are driven by human values, facilitating the development of value-driven conversational agents.
dcterms:title: ValueNet

dcterms:creator: J. Graham

dcterms:description: A dictionary that categorizes words and phrases according to moral foundations, used for analyzing moral language in various contexts.
dcterms:title: Moral Foundations Dictionary
